lines.gurmukhi: crn kml ky mhwqm AgwiD boiD Aiq Ascrj mY nmo nmo nm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Kay Mahaatam Agaadhi Bodhi , Ati Asacharaj Mai Namo Namo Nam Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The praise of the lotus feet of Satguru Ii is comprehension. It is indeed wonderful. Salutations time and again.

lines.gurmukhi: koml komlqw Aau sIql sIqlqw kY bwsnw subwsu qwsu duqIAw n sm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Komal Komalataa Au Seetal Seetalataa Kai , Baasanaa Soubaasu Taasu Douteeaa N Sam Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: They are tender than the tenderness of the whole world. They are indeed comfortably cool. No other fragrance matches them.

lines.gurmukhi: shj smwiD inj Awsn isMGwsn s√çwd ibsmwd rs gMimq Agm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sahaj Samaadhi Nij Aasan Singhaasana , Svaad Bisamaad Ras Ganmit Agam Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The disciple, who lives ever in attendance of the holy feet of the True Satguru Ii and has worked hard on meditation of Lord's name, has relished the supernatural elixir of Naam Simran.

lines.gurmukhi: rUp kY AnUp rUp mn mnsw bkq AkQ kQw ibnod ibsmY ibsm hY ]80]
lines.transliteration_english: Roop Kai Anoop Roop Man Manasaa Bakata , Akad Kadaa Binod Bisamai Bisam Hai ?80?

Shabad OS B.translation: The beauty of Satguru's lotus feet is exemplary. The desire and faculty of mind tires describing it. Their praise indescribable. This wonder of wonders is astonishing. (80)
